member.name: M:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.Contracts.IConverter.Convert(WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.Contracts.IDocument)
member.summary: Converts document based on given settings

member.name: M:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.Contracts.ITools.Load
member.summary: Load library and initialize wkhtmltopdf

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.Contracts.ITools.IsLoaded
member.summary: Is set to true if library is loaded and wkhtmltopdf is initialized successfully

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.FooterSettings.FontSize
member.summary: The font size to use for the footer. Default = 12

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.FooterSettings.FontName
member.summary: The name of the font to use for the footer. Default = "Ariel"

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.FooterSettings.Left
member.summary: The string to print in the left part of the footer, note that some sequences are replaced in this string, see the wkhtmltopdf manual. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.FooterSettings.Center
member.summary: The text to print in the right part of the footer, note that some sequences are replaced in this string, see the wkhtmltopdf manual. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.FooterSettings.Right
member.summary: The text to print in the right part of the footer, note that some sequences are replaced in this string, see the wkhtmltopdf manual. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.FooterSettings.Line
member.summary: Whether a line should be printed above the footer. Default = false

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.FooterSettings.Spacing
member.summary: The amount of space to put between the footer and the content, e.g. "1.8". Be aware that if this is too large the footer will be printed outside the pdf document. This can be corrected with the margin.bottom setting. Default = 0.00

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.FooterSettings.HtmlUrl
member.summary: Url for a HTML document to use for the footer. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.Orientation
member.summary: The orientation of the output document, must be either "Landscape" or "Portrait". Default = "portrait"

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.ColorMode
member.summary: Should the output be printed in color or gray scale, must be either "Color" or "Grayscale". Default = "color"

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.UseCompression
member.summary: Should we use loss less compression when creating the pdf file. Default = true

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.DPI
member.summary: What dpi should we use when printing. Default = 96

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.PageOffset
member.summary: A number that is added to all page numbers when printing headers, footers and table of content. Default = 0

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.Copies
member.summary: How many copies should we print. Default = 1

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.Collate
member.summary: Should the copies be collated. Default = true

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.Outline
member.summary: Should a outline (table of content in the sidebar) be generated and put into the PDF. Default = true

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.OutlineDepth
member.summary: The maximal depth of the outline. Default = 4

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.DumpOutline
member.summary: If not set to the empty string a XML representation of the outline is dumped to this file. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.Out
member.summary: The path of the output file, if "-" output is sent to stdout, if empty the output is stored in a buffer. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.DocumentTitle
member.summary: The title of the PDF document. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.ImageDPI
member.summary: The maximal DPI to use for images in the pdf document. Default = 600

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.ImageQuality
member.summary: The jpeg compression factor to use when producing the pdf document. Default = 94

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.CookieJar
member.summary: Path of file used to load and store cookies. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.PaperSize
member.summary: Size of output paper

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.PaperHeight
member.summary: The height of the output document

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.PaperWidth
member.summary: The width of the output document

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.MarginLeft
member.summary: Size of the left margin

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.MarginRight
member.summary: Size of the right margin

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.MarginTop
member.summary: Size of the top margin

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.MarginBottom
member.summary: Size of the bottom margin

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.GlobalSettings.ViewportSize
member.summary: Set viewport size. Not supported in wkhtmltopdf API since v0.12.2.4

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.HeaderSettings.FontSize
member.summary: The font size to use for the header. Default = 12

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.HeaderSettings.FontName
member.summary: The name of the font to use for the header. Default = "Ariel"

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.HeaderSettings.Left
member.summary: The string to print in the left part of the header, note that some sequences are replaced in this string, see the wkhtmltopdf manual. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.HeaderSettings.Center
member.summary: The text to print in the right part of the header, note that some sequences are replaced in this string, see the wkhtmltopdf manual. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.HeaderSettings.Right
member.summary: The text to print in the right part of the header, note that some sequences are replaced in this string, see the wkhtmltopdf manual. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.HeaderSettings.Line
member.summary: Whether a line should be printed under the header. Default = false

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.HeaderSettings.Spacing
member.summary: The amount of space to put between the header and the content, e.g. "1.8". Be aware that if this is too large the header will be printed outside the pdf document. This can be corrected with the margin.top setting. Default = 0.00

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.HeaderSettings.HtmlUrl
member.summary: Url for a HTML document to use for the header. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.Username
member.summary: The user name to use when loging into a website. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.Password
member.summary: The password to used when logging into a website. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.JSDelay
member.summary: The mount of time in milliseconds to wait after a page has done loading until it is actually printed. E.g. "1200". We will wait this amount of time or until, javascript calls window.print(). Default = 200

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.ZoomFactor
member.summary: How much should we zoom in on the content. Default = 1.0

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.BlockLocalFileAccess
member.summary: Disallow local and piped files to access other local files. Default = true

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.StopSlowScript
member.summary: Stop slow running javascript. Default = true

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.DebugJavascript
member.summary: Forward javascript warnings and errors to the warning callback. Default = false

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.LoadErrorHandling
member.summary: How should we handle obejcts that fail to load. Default = Abort

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.Proxy
member.summary: String describing what proxy to use when loading the object. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.CustomHeaders
member.summary: Custom headers used when requesting page. Defaulty = empty

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.RepeatCustomHeaders
member.summary: Should the custom headers be sent all elements loaded instead of only the main page. Default = false

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.Cookies
member.summary: Cookies used when requesting page. Default = empty

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.LoadSettings.Post
member.summary: Post items

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.ObjectSettings.Page
member.summary: The URL or path of the web page to convert, if "-" input is read from stdin. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.ObjectSettings.UseExternalLinks
member.summary: Should external links in the HTML document be converted into external pdf links. Default = true

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.ObjectSettings.UseLocalLinks
member.summary: Should internal links in the HTML document be converted into pdf references. Default = true

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.ObjectSettings.ProduceForms
member.summary: Should we turn HTML forms into PDF forms. Default = false

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.ObjectSettings.IncludeInOutline
member.summary: Should the sections from this document be included in the outline and table of content. Default = false

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.ObjectSettings.PagesCount
member.summary: Should we count the pages of this document, in the counter used for TOC, headers and footers. Default = false

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.TableOfContentsSettings.IsTableOfContent
member.summary: Should we create a table of contents

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.TableOfContentsSettings.CaptionText
member.summary: Name/Headline of the TOC

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.TableOfContentsSettings.UseDottedLines
member.summary: Should we print dots between the name and the page number?

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.WebSettings.Background
member.summary: Should we print the background. Default = true

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.WebSettings.LoadImages
member.summary: Should we load images. Default = true

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.WebSettings.EnableJavascript
member.summary: Should we enable javascript. Default = true

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.WebSettings.EnableIntelligentShrinking
member.summary: Should we enable intelligent shrinkng to fit more content on one page. Has no effect for wkhtmltoimage. Default = true

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.WebSettings.MinimumFontSize
member.summary: The minimum font size allowed. Default = -1

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.WebSettings.PrintMediaType
member.summary: Should the content be printed using the print media type instead of the screen media type. Default = false

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.WebSettings.DefaultEncoding
member.summary: What encoding should we guess content is using if they do not specify it properly. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.WebSettings.UserStyleSheet
member.summary: Url or path to a user specified style sheet. Default = ""

member.name: P:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.WebSettings.enablePlugins
member.summary: Should we enable NS plugins. Enabling this will have limited success. Default = false

member.name: T:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.CustomUnmanagedType
member.summary: This enum "extends" UnmanagedType enum from System.Runtime.InteropServices v4.1.0 which doesn't have LPUTF8Str (enum value is 48) enumartion defined

member.name: T:WkHtmlToPdfDotNet.PaperKind
member.summary: Enumaration of paper kinds from http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.drawing.printing.paperkind.aspx Implemented here because Syste.Drawing.Printing is not ported to NET Core
